title: Carly's Magnificent Magnet
description: When Carly gets a new magnet to help Tess the Troublesome Crane load up a shipment of metal crates, she struggles with the new tool. Carly is frustrated that she's making mistakes during the job. Sandy and Thomas reassure Carly that she needs give herself time to be bad at it. Mistakes are part of learning something new! When Sandy ends up careening towards the water, Carly will have to put her new knowledge to the test and hope she won't make another mistake.
seriesname: Thomas and Friends: All Engines Go
originalseriesname: Thomas and Friends: All Engines Go
